column2:
"What, you think you can take your Fighter
mojo to a whole other level?"

"Well, you're gonna have to prove it to me.
I mean, that's what the mutual evaluation
system's all about, right?"

"The test is plain and simple. All you've got to
do is finish all the tasks I give you."

"Remember, no fear, ever. And always stay
cool. Now, go nail that test. I'll be waiting for
your report."
